content: video tutorial of pattern can be found https //youtu be/avh5boepayy wearing a mask isn t fun to begin with but wearing it all day multiple days in a row can quickly create a lot of pain from rubbing on ears these mask mates provide an alternative to attach the mask to behind the head saving the ears of our frontline workers **size ** when finished measures about 5 inches this may vary based on gauge but notes on how to adjust as needed **supplies needed ** -small amount worsted weight yarn in color of choice - 2 large buttons 3/4 inch to 1 inch works best below ½ inch may not hold mask -size h/5 00 hook -embroidery or yarn needle scissors **stitches/techniques used ** pattern is in u s terms chain half_double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch **experience level and time ** this pattern is super easy even for beginners and works up fast too you can make multiple in just an hour after you get the hang of it if you have questions let me know
